Articles.Content:
This is with a AMD R9 280. Submenues, including everythign under 'settings' and 'load game' have no buttons at all.

 

Game started with ./KSP.x86_64 -force-gfx-direct
Have you tried backing up your saves and reinstalling the game? The only thing I could think of are some missing files.

It's a brand new installation. Edit: tried fullscreen and that works.

Edited July 16, 2016 by Requia

You can get around this in windowed mode as well by forcing the Unity game engine to redetect your version of OpenGL.

Start the game via terminal or script with ./KSP.x86_64 -force-glcore

-force-glcore is a windows-only command

Tried it for the sake of completeness, no effect
I stand corrected, -force-glcore does do something, the menus no longer work in fullscreen either. deleting the prefs and settings/cfg file and starting over didn't fix it.
What about the unity's own config? ( $HOME/.config/unity3d/Squad/Kerbal\ Space\ Program/prefs )
That's what I mean when I say I deleted the prefs file.
